name: • Whenever you see a light, remember that you live in the future.... •
description: Dystopian, contrasting and psychedelic, this is what the future looks like, lifeless but full of movement, extremely saturated and bright but with melancholic tints, nothing you can't get used to.  Seeing how in just one year the world became sedentary and technological adaptation increased is a great indication that a new era is born from now on, the new generations, the pioneers of the new era, come to revolutionize everything our parents knew.  The simple fact of rejecting governments and raising a new and decentralized economy is proof of it, with the arrival of cryptocurrencies the new generations planted in front of the problems of their countries and that was just the beginning....  The flashy, the psychedelic, the original and the extravagant are the future, the lights, the buildings, the unusual luxuries are the standard of what is coming in the future.
